decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (28SGR2, dated 05/2014; 28SGR3, dated 05/2014; received 17/06/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall be pebbledashed to match those rear elevations of the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The window in the eastern elevation of the extension hereby permitted will be obscure galzed and non-opening and will be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.  No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a two-storey rear extension including a basement enlargement to the house
